Interface IApplicationRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
CSVApplicationRepository
public interface IApplicationRepository
Repository interface for managing applications. Follows Interface Segregation Principle by providing a focused contract for application-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • findByStatus

      List<Applicant> findByStatus(ApplicationStatus status)
      Finds applications by their status.
      Parameters:
      status - The application status to search for
      Returns:
      A list of applicants with the specified application status

    • findByProject

      List<Applicant> findByProject(int projectId)
      Finds applications for a specific project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project
      Returns:
      A list of applicants who have applied for the specified project

    • findByFlatType

      List<Applicant> findByFlatType(String flatType)
      Finds applications for a specific flat type.
      Parameters:
      flatType - The flat type to search for (e.g., "2-Room", "3-Room")
      Returns:
      A list of applicants who have applied for the specified flat type

    • updateStatus

      boolean updateStatus(String applicantNric, ApplicationStatus status)
      Updates the status of an application.
      Parameters:
      applicantNric - The NRIC of the applicant
      status - The new application status
      Returns:
      true if the status was updated successfully, false otherwise

    • apply

      boolean apply(Applicant applicant, int projectId, String flatType)
      Applies for a project.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant
      projectId - The ID of the project
      flatType - The flat type (e.g., "2-Room", "3-Room")
      Returns:
      true if the application was successful, false otherwise

    • withdraw

      boolean withdraw(String applicantNric)
      Withdraws an application.
      Parameters:
      applicantNric - The NRIC of the applicant
      Returns:
      true if the withdrawal was successful, false otherwise

    • book

      boolean book(String applicantNric)
      Books a flat for an applicant.
      Parameters:
      applicantNric - The NRIC of the applicant
      Returns:
      true if the booking was successful, false otherwise

      boolean reject(String applicantNric)
      Rejects an application.
      Parameters:
      applicantNric - The NRIC of the applicant
      Returns:
      true if the rejection was successful, false otherwise
